title: App Developers & Staff Augmentation
subtitle: Stop recruiting and start developing. Hire highly qualified niche specialists who will help you make an app that suits your business objectives.

process.title: The Pipeline For Getting Your Own Team of App Developers

items.title: Contact Us
items.lead: Describe your product and the developing help you need, and we will choose three candidates that fit your project

items.title: Meet the Team
items.lead: Meet and interview your candidates so that you can get started on developing your software

items.title: Finalize Deal
items.lead: We handle all employee administration costs so you can start bringing your project idea to fruition

items.title: Begin Developing
items.lead: Your app development team is ready to go, aware of the scope of the project, and ready to begin development of your software project

services.title: Outsourcing with Intellectsoft
services.lead: We offer prompt, effective, and hassle-free staff augmentation for all of your development projects.

items.title: Educated experts
items.lead: Over 70% of our app developers developers completed a postgraduate program.

items.title: In-demand technical skills
items.lead: Big data, cloud services, cross-platform development, product integration, DevOps, and more.

items.title: Expanded hours
items.lead: When our teams work while you sleep, you wake up to something amazing.

advantages.title: Intellectsoft Advantages
advantages.lead: We pride ourselves on being able to make offshore employees feel like an in-house development team

items.title: Saved Time
items.lead: Minimize time spent on recruitment and personnel training

items.title: A+ Team
items.lead: Start working with the perfect team from day one

items.title: Niche Skills
items.lead: Our team helps you build knowledge and improve your product

items.title: Driven Employees
items.lead: You gain a highly-motivated and qualified staff

items.title: Build Knowledge
items.lead: You can tap into our marketing, business, and DevOps knowledge

items.title: Smooth Integration
items.lead: Our developers assimilate with your team and become a part of your daily scrum meeting

portfolio.title: We Have Worked With
portfolio.lead: We have developed mobile applications and enterprise software suites for these companies:

items.title: Harley-Davidson
items.lead: A Fortune 500 IT company needed software that would report data from a smart device designed to collect pressure and time data.

items.title: Jaguar Land Rover
items.lead: The Jaguar Talk solution is a multilingual mobile application that lets users leap over language barriers with ease.

items.title: Cirrus Insight
items.lead: Cirruspath was behind the highest-rated app for integrating Salesforce with a user’s email inbox. Cirrus Insight Mobile helps you leverage your sales data to gain valuable insights and uncover new opportunities.

content.title: What we can do for you
content.lead: We started by making software for startups, moved to building enterprise apps so clients can connect their business to their employees, and now, we’ve structured a staff augmentation and dedicated team service to make our talent more accessible to clients while allowing them to keep full control over their projects.
list: Your desire to succeed can only be rivaled by ours. Any personnel changes or additions that need to be made—will be
We take care of compensation, taxes, benefits, travel expenses, and replacements. All that’s left for your business is success
We are confident in the quality of our outstaffing services and our ability to compete with in-house development.
We help you fill long and short-term technical staff gaps without having to worry about costs associated with seasonality or staffing changes.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.lead: Contact us to take the first step towards creating software that will drive your business forward.
